adjectives.description: entitled (comparative more entitled, superlative most entitled)

entries.meaning: Having a legal or moral right or claim to something.
examples: As a natural-born citizen I am entitled to run for president.
If you were injured at work you may be entitled to compensation.
He feels entitled to other people's respect.

entries.meaning: (figuratively) Convinced of one's own righteousness (self-righteousness) or the justifiability of one's actions or status, especially wrongly so; demanding and pretentious.
examples: Look at these entitled assholesâ€¦ they don't give a shit about anybody.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of entitle
